QuestData.Title: Elemental Tampering
QuestData.Description: The Searing Blade's warlocks have enslaved Ragefire Chasm's elemental spirits, $n. They aren't a threat to the city while my spell keeps them at bay, but I can't maintain it much longer.$B$BBring me six of the Searing Bindings used to control them and I will release their spirits back into the Chasm.
